channel.title: King's force pardon doesn't make target immune to accusations
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was Evil King and I used "Decide Fate" to force pardon mm. The rest just reaccused him immediately, made him stand trial and executed him.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? According to wiki, force pardon makes the target immune to any more accusations for that day. So he should survive that day.
#### Steps to reproduce: Accuse someone so he stands trial. As King force pardon him. Reaccuse that someone and execute him.
#### Comments: I can't be 100% sure that force pardon works that way. The in-game description of the ability doesn't say anything about accusation immunity. However, if it doesn't work that way, it seems pretty useless.
Oh, btw the version is 1.0.10c .
